titles: Pieties pillar: or, A sermon preached at the funerall of mistresse Elizabeth Gouge, late wife of Mr. William Gouge, of Black-friers, London With a true narration of her life and death. By Nicholas Guy, pastor of the church at Edge-ware in Middlesex.
author: Guy, Nicholas, b. 1587 or 8.
publisher: Printed by George Millar [sic], dwelling in Black-Friers,
notes: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
